reviews.content: Flipkart app is the WORST amongst all the available online shopping apps. Whenever I try to search something in Grocery, it simply freezes after 1 or 2 searches/inquiries. This makes the overall shopping experience really bad.

The application is excellent for shopping — smooth interface, great product variety, and good deals. I genuinely wanted to give it 5 stars, but I'm rating it 3 due to two major issues: 1. High Data Consumption: If you scroll through the app for about an hour, it can consume around 1.5GB of data, which is quite excessive for a shopping app. 2. Scrolling Bug: Whenever I scroll through items and open a product, hitting the back button takes me to the top of the list instead of where I left off.

Flipkart has become my go-to app for everything. Just one request—please update the UI. When I browse a list and select an item, then go back, it takes me to the top of the list instead of where I left off. Its so frustrating to manually browse again to the item from where you last checked.
